email_subject: Struts 1.1 Article, JavaServer Faces Tech Talk, iXML & Widget Pages Patterns, JRun 4.0 Review
email_body:

Enterprise Java Education Strategies

New Patterns

 o Widget Pages 

New App Server Reviews

Key J2EE Industry News Headlines
